content.description:
You will listen to a selection in Japanese. After listening to the selection, choose the response that is best according to the selection.

Uncontextualized Dialogue (Selection plays one time.)
content.question: What special instruction is given?

choices.label: Take a plastic bag when going out for a walk.
Put the trash in plastic garbage bags.
Reheat the food for about ten minutes.
Water the plants in the morning and at night.

content.answer: Take a plastic bag when going out for a walk.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
